Text:
Wow, thanks 2040!
Would it be possible to have the previous two (Hogfather and The colour of magic) also converted? :-)

@newash: I encoded both, of course, but not since I am here. I arrived on TPB maybe six months ago when my old "home" have bitten the dust. And from recent past I have almost nothing, because I cannot afford to buy myself blank DVDs. Sorry.
